function addEvent(el, ev, fn) {

el.addEventListener(ev, fn);
} else if (el.attachEvent) {

<script onerror="javascript:window.errorEventHandler && window.errorEventHandler(event)" src="//mc.stu.126.net/pub/s/libH5Shiv_f4d9dea8e0ae8455500862bbb874d63c.js"></script>

<script src="//hubble-js-bucket.nosdn.127.net/DATracker.sync.1.6.11.js"></script>
<script>
DATracker.init("MA-A976-948FFA05E931", {
truncateLength: 255,
persistence: "localStorage",
cross_subdomain_cookie: false,
use_app_track: true,
heatmap: {
isTrackLink: true,
collect_all: true,
collect_url: function() {
//使用场景如：
//学习页面不再采集
if (location.href.indexOf("/learn/") > -1) {
return false;
} else {
return true;
}
},
// 自定义设置采集的元素的路径，需返回该元素的path，
// 该路径是热力图渲染时查找元素所需，请正确设置
set_collect_element_path: function(targetElement, heatmap) {
try {
var pathMap = {"a:nth-child":"ANC","aside:nth-child":"ASNC","article:nth-child":"ATNC","button:nth-child":"BNC","code:nth-child":"CDNC","canvas:nth-child":"CVNC","div:nth-child":"DVNC","footer:nth-child":"FTNC","form:nth-child":"FMNC","frame:nth-child":"FRNC","header:nth-child":"HDNC","iframe:nth-child":"IFNC","img:nth-child":"IGNC","input:nth-child":"IPNC","label:nth-child":"LBNC","li:nth-child":"LINC","p:nth-child":"PNC","section:nth-child":"SCNC","span:nth-child":"SPNC","table:nth-child":"TBNC","tbody:nth-child":"TYNC","td:nth-child":"TDNC","textarea:nth-child":"TANC","tfoot:nth-child":"TFNC","th:nth-child":"THNC","ul:nth-child":"ULNC"}
var selector = function(targetElement) {
var i = (targetElement.parentNode && 9 == targetElement.parentNode.nodeType) ? -1 : heatmap.getDomIndex(targetElement);
var pathStr = targetElement.tagName.toLowerCase()
+ (~i ? ':nth-child(' + (i + 1) + ')' : '');
for( let key in pathMap) {
var re = new RegExp(key, 'g');
pathStr = pathStr.replace(re, pathMap[key]);
}
return pathStr;
};
var getDomSelector = function(targetElement,arr) {
if(!targetElement || !targetElement.parentNode || !targetElement.parentNode.children){
return false;
}
arr = arr && arr.join ? arr : [];
var name = targetElement.nodeName.toLowerCase();
if (!targetElement || name === 'body' || 1 != targetElement.nodeType) {
arr.unshift('body');
return arr.join(' > ');
}
arr.unshift(selector(targetElement));
return getDomSelector(targetElement.parentNode, arr);
}
return getDomSelector(targetElement);
} catch (error) {
}
}
}
})
document.addEventListener('click',function(e){
var $node = e.target;
try{
if($node.classList.contains('ga-click')){
//替换打点
var params = getGaParams($node);
console.log('hubble打点成功');
DATracker.track(params.data_cate, params);
return ;
}
var $parent = $node.parentNode
while($parent.nodeName != 'BODY'){
if($parent.classList.contains('ga-click')){
var _params = getGaParams($parent);
console.log('hubble打点成功');
DATracker.track(_params.data_cate, _params);
return ;
}else{
$parent = $parent.parentNode;
}
}
}catch(e){
console.log(e);
}
}) ;
function getGaParams(node){
var obj = {};
obj.user_id = window.webUser && window.webUser.id;
//事件名
obj.data_cate = node.getAttribute('data-cate') || '';
obj.data_action = node.getAttribute('data-action') || '';
obj.data_label = node.getAttribute('data-label') || '';
obj.data_pagename = window.location.href;
//解析额外参数，如id等等
var bizData = node.getAttribute('data-bizData') || '';
try{
bizData = JSON.parse(bizData) || {};
for(var prop in bizData){
obj[prop] = bizData[prop];
}
}catch(e){
console.log(e);
}
return obj;
}

<div class="navRight-func-i_div38_div56">
<div class="nav-searchFunc-i">
<div class="j-search-box nav-searchFunc-i_div57">
<div class="j-input nav-searchFunc-i_div57_div58"><div class="u-sugInput"> <div class="iptArea f-cb"> <div class="ipt"><div class="u-insug"> <div class="area"><div class="u-baseinputui" style="height: 30px;"> <input autocomplete="off" class="j-textarea inputtxt" id="auto-id-1556699360655" name="search" style="height: 20px;" type="text"/> <label class="j-hint inputhint" for="inputtxt" id="auto-id-1556699360653">搜索感兴趣的课程</label> </div></div> <div class="sug" style="display:none"> <div class="f-thide s-fc6 ar j-basetxt">请选择或继续输入...</div> <div class=""></div> </div> </div></div> </div> </div></div>
<div class="nav-searchFunc-i_div57_div59">
<span class="u-icon-search2 j-searchBtn nav-searchFunc-i_div57_div59_span60" id="auto-id-1556699360661"></span>
</div>

<div class="m-learnhead">
<div class="f-cb">
<a class="schoolImg f-fl" hidefocus="true" href="/university/COMPUTER" target="_blank" title="中国高校计算机教育MOOC联盟">
<img alt="中国高校计算机教育MOOC联盟" class="" height="40" id="" src="https://nos.netease.com/edu-image/3A1546D20C245B2D8BB3C7E68ECD26A3-1442989160516?imageView&amp;thumbnail=220y80&amp;quality=100" width="108"/>
</a>
<div class="f-fl info">
<div class="f-cb">
<a class="f-fl" hidefocus="true" href="/spoc/course/COMPUTER-1002604037" target="_blank">
<h4 class="f-fc3 courseTxt">2018春大学计算机--计算思维导论（哈尔滨商业大学）</h4>
</a>
<span class="spoctag f-f0 f-fl">SPOC | 学校专有课程</span>
</div>
<h5 class="f-fc6 padding-top-5">
<a class="f-fcgreen" href="/u/1551878878" target="_blank">于凤</a>
</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="g-wrap f-cb">
<div class="g-sd1">
<div class="m-learnleft">
<div class="top f-pr">
<img alt="2018春大学计算机--计算思维导论（哈尔滨商业大学）" class="" height="130" id="" src="https://edu-image.nosdn.127.net/A3307E3F298F1FFCBCB9D4AC71F41CE9.png?imageView&amp;thumbnail=510y288&amp;quality=100" width="230"/>
<span class="spocicon f-pa"></span>
<div class="u-searchIpt search" style="display:none;">
<form action="/search.htm" autocomplete="off" target="_blank">
<input name="search" type="text"/><input class="f-icon" type="submit" value=""/>
</form>
</div>
</div>

<div class="m-relatedmooc f-bg f-f0 f-fc3" title="大学计算机—计算思维导论">
<p class="mtit">同步于源课程：</p>
<p class="mname f-thide">哈尔滨工业大学 大学计算机—计算思维导论</p>
<p class="mschool f-fc6">该学习页将完全采用同步课程的栏目结构和内容，同时开课老师会在这些栏目下增加更多内容。</p>
</div>

<div class="g-mn1">
<div class="g-mn1c">
<div class="m-learnbox" id="courseLearn-inner-box"><div class="u-learn-modulewidth"><div class="j-breadNavBox"><div class="u-forumbreadnav"><a href="#/learn/forumindex">讨论区</a><span class="f-icon split u-icon-caret-right"></span><a href="#/learn/forumpanel?id=1002963420">课堂交流区</a><span class="f-icon split u-icon-caret-right"></span><span>主题详情</span></div></div><div class="j-detailBox auto-1556699360759-parent"><div class="auto-1556699360759"> <div class="j-post auto-1556699360743-parent"><div class="auto-1556699360743"> <div class="f-cb"> <h3 class="j-title title f-fl">【讨论12-1】网络教学模式反馈——盘点一学期的收获</h3> <a class="f-fr u-btn u-btn-sm u-btn-default j-transBtn" id="auto-id-1556699360796" style="display:none">迁移至“过往学期精华贴”</a> <div class="f-cb f-fr j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagSolveNode">已解决</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagTeacherNode">老师参与</div></div></div> <div class="content f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_0"><p style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: Arial, "Hiragino Sans GB", SimSun, 宋体, serif; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: pre-wrap; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);'><span style="word-wrap: break-word; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 14px;">1、对于MOOC+SPOC这种网络化教学模式，你怎么看？MOOC+SPOC平台提供的资料对你是否有帮助？你能否主动利用网络完成自主学习（例如：课前主动预习、课后积极复习）？</span></p><p style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: Arial, "Hiragino Sans GB", SimSun, 宋体, serif; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: pre-wrap; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);'><span style="word-wrap: break-word; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 14px;">2、你觉得老师在课堂上的教学模式、教学方法及教学效果如何？你有哪些建议？</span></p><p style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: Arial, "Hiragino Sans GB", SimSun, 宋体, serif; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: pre-wrap; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);'><span style="word-wrap: break-word; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 14px;">3、作为学习者，你在课堂上的学习态度、学习效率及学习效果怎样？能否主动配合老师达到教学效果最优化？如果不能，主要原因是什么？</span></p><p style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: Arial, "Hiragino Sans GB", SimSun, 宋体, serif; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: pre-wrap; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);'><span style="word-wrap: break-word; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 14px;">4、请盘点你在这一学期中的收获。</span></p><p style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: Arial, "Hiragino Sans GB", SimSun, 宋体, serif; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: pre-wrap; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);'><span style="word-wrap: break-word; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 14px;">注：请不要把这个讨论题目当成问答题哦，就你有深刻感触的方面发表你的看法！！！<br/></span></p><p><br class="Apple-interchange-newline"/></p><p><br/></p></div><div class="infobar f-cb"><div class="j-infoBox" style="display: none;"><div class="f-fl name j-name"></div><div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time"></div></div><div class="f-fl f-fc9 j-fromUnitBox">来自课件“<a class="j-fromUnit f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/content?type=detail&amp;id=1004130576&amp;cid=1005110469">【讨论12-1】网络教学模式反馈——盘点一学期的收获</a>”</div> </div> <div class="optbar f-cb"> <div class="j-share f-fl" id="auto-id-1556699360799"></div><div class="f-cb f-fr optBox j-optBox"><div class="f-fl j-editDivider divider">|</div><a class="f-fl f-fc9 editBtn j-editBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360791">编辑</a><div class="f-fl divider">|</div><a class="f-fl f-fc9 editBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360792">举报</a><div class="f-fl j-manBox auto-1556699360740-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360740" id="auto-id-1556699360805"> <div class="f-fl bd">|</div> <a class="f-fl f-fc9 manBtn" hidefocus="true"><span></span>管理</a> </div></div></div><div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699360801" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="4">4</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699360802" title="踩"></div> </div></div> <a class="replyBtn u-btn u-btn-sm j-replyBtn f-fr" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360794"><span><i></i>回复</span></a> <a class="followBtn u-btn u-btn-sm j-followBtn f-fr unfollowed" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360793"> <span class="first j-followInner"><i></i>关注</span> <span class="second j-followInner"><i></i>已关注</span> <span class="secHvr j-followInner">取消关注</span> </a> </div> </div></div> <div class="j-banState"><div class="u-userBanned f-fs1">当前版块已被讨论区管理员关闭，无法发表任何主题、回复、评论、关注或者对帖子进行投票。</div></div> <div class="rinfobox f-cb"> <h4 class="j-reply-info f-fl">共208回复</h4> <div class="j-reply-sort f-fr auto-1556699360757-parent"><div class="auto-1556699360757">                排序方式：<a class="j-time double downsort" id="auto-id-1556699360818" style="">回复时间<span></span></a><span class="divider"></span><a class="j-vote single nosort" id="auto-id-1556699360819" style="">投票数</a></div></div> </div> <div class="j-reply-all allbox auto-1556699360736-parent"><div class="m-basepool f-cb auto-1556699360736"> <div class="j-list"> <div class="m-data-lists f-cb f-pr j-data-list auto-1556699360755-parent"><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent first" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_1">自主预习，对于老师留的测验及时进行，网络平台上的资料对我很有帮助。 此外，在学习中，我对网络知识有了一个系统的了解。学会了Word(文字处理)、excel(表格管理)、powerpoint(幻灯片制作)、等等软件的较为深入的应用。但这次学习更多的是让我更新了全新的观念和想法，充分认识到了现代教育教学媒体特性的重要性</div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/forumpersonal?uid=1136576136" title="hrbcu2076杨媛媛_杨媛媛">hrbcu2076杨...</a></span> </span></div> <div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time">2018-7-2</div> <div class="f-fr j-manBox auto-1556699360740-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360740" id="auto-id-1556699360866"> <div class="f-fl bd">|</div> <a class="f-fl f-fc9 manBtn" hidefocus="true"><span></span>管理</a> </div></div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360861">举报</a> <div class="f-fr divider">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-delBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360862" style="display: none;">删除</a> <div class="j-delDivider f-fr divider" style="display: none;">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt cmtBtn j-cmtBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360863">评论(0)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699360881" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="1">1</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699360882" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_2">网络化教学方式相比于课堂教学更便捷，并且我能在课前自主预习，对于老师留的测验及时进行，网络平台上的资料对我很有帮助。</div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/forumpersonal?uid=1136576152" title="hrbcu2031李蓝艳">hrbcu2031李...</a></span> </span></div> <div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time">2018-6-30</div> <div class="f-fr j-manBox auto-1556699360740-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360740" id="auto-id-1556699360893"> <div class="f-fl bd">|</div> <a class="f-fl f-fc9 manBtn" hidefocus="true"><span></span>管理</a> </div></div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360888">举报</a> <div class="f-fr divider">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-delBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360889" style="display: none;">删除</a> <div class="j-delDivider f-fr divider" style="display: none;">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt cmtBtn j-cmtBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360890">评论(0)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699360908" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="0">0</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699360909" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_3">MOOC从制作的角度来看，和常见的电大网院课程有本质的区别，它更象一部电影的做法。而所有这些做法都只是为了一个目的，就是为了更好通过电视电影的手段和方法，更好的呈现一门课程。一个完整的MOOC团队是非常复杂的，包括：项目经理、助教、志愿者、制作人、摄制团队、后期制作、运营人员；整个制作流程也很长，包括：选题、知识点设计、拍宣传片、集中摄制、后期制作、测试反馈、运营 数据；上课按周来算，每个课程一般有十周左右的时间，老师提前准备好内容，每个知识点用什么方式去拍，可以是实验室实景，也可以3D制作模型，可以有板书，也可以由配套测试题，对老师来说对着镜头讲跟对着课堂感觉是完全不同。和传统认为的老师直接把课堂的内容对着镜头读一遍有很大不同，老师为制作MOOC课程，平均一个小时的视频，至少要十倍到二十倍的时间做前期课程内容的准备，即使这个老师的课讲得已经非常熟了。

对于经常被提到的MOOC课程完成率，Coursera完成率8%左右，其实已经挺高了。任何一个东西要看整个社会成本和产生的收益，一个大学的教授在为几十个学生讲课时，整个社会都在为他付出成本，这个运营成本其实非常高。一个大学的运营成本至少好几个亿，但是大学一年才能培养多少人？而互联网让社会资源和效益最大化，虽然完成率低，但其实所覆盖的人群是很广的，而且可以以非常低的成本继续迭代，付出的社会成本与收益是成正比的。

以前的视频课程都是单向传播的，MOOC课程是一个质的飞跃，相当于互联网Web1.0到 Web 2.0的升级；或者NOKIA功能机与iPhone智能手机的区别。以前一些计算机辅助教学是在是某个专业，某些院系部分使用，而现在是整个大学都要使用这种在线教学的方式，提高整个高校的教学水平，慕课把这个变成整个社会要做的事情。以前只是行内人（远程教育或者老师这些必须关注的人）在做，现在全社会都在关注，会影响到我们每个人。

线上学习都是学生自发的，时间反而更多，参与程度高，做纵向对比，用线上方式学习这种模式是可行的，而且效果可能比线下还好。每个学生的学习记录都有跟踪。

我们今天要做的是，用MOOC这种方式提供一套完整的知识体系，尝试形成一定的学科体系，然后会拓展到其他各个专业和领域，提供学位的线上教育体系。

未来的大学学习可能有两部分，一半是传统的线下课堂教学，一半是线上的在线教学。而线上又分为两种MOOC和SPOC两种。SPOC类似于翻译课堂，只在本校中使用，而MOOC是可以开放给其它高校，当然也可以从其它高校引进MOOC课程。

“子欲立而先立人，子欲达而先达人”，一直以来过来人就把帮助青年人职业成长作为已任，我们相信当我们能帮助到成千上百万人的时候，我们就一定会成功。

这也是过来人一直秉承的理念，以前过来人最多的是线下的讲座和培训，虽然最疯狂的时候一年可以在高校中做800场讲座，但影响的人数也是有限的。MOOC让我们看到了另外一种力量，原来我们有机会帮助到千百万人。

当我们为MOOC的发展感到兴奋的时候，我们也该默默感谢这些为教育，为在线教育身先士卒的人们，无论他们是先烈还是先驱，都有值得我们学习的地方</div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/forumpersonal?uid=1136576045" title="hrbcu2030田玉寒">hrbcu2030田...</a></span> </span></div> <div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time">2018-6-30</div> <div class="f-fr j-manBox auto-1556699360740-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360740" id="auto-id-1556699360920"> <div class="f-fl bd">|</div> <a class="f-fl f-fc9 manBtn" hidefocus="true"><span></span>管理</a> </div></div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360915">举报</a> <div class="f-fr divider">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-delBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360916" style="display: none;">删除</a> <div class="j-delDivider f-fr divider" style="display: none;">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt cmtBtn j-cmtBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360917">评论(0)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699360935" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="0">0</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699360936" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_4">网络化教学方式相比于课堂教学更便捷，并且我能在课前自主预习，对于老师留的测验及时进行，网络平台上的资料对我很有帮助。 此外，在学习中，我对网络知识有了一个系统的了解。学会了Word(文字处理)、excel(表格管理)、powerpoint(幻灯片制作)、等等软件的较为深入的应用。但这次学习更多的是让我更新了全新的观念和想法，充分认识到了现代教育教学媒体特性的重要性</div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/forumpersonal?uid=1136576045" title="hrbcu2030田玉寒">hrbcu2030田...</a></span> </span></div> <div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time">2018-6-30</div> <div class="f-fr j-manBox auto-1556699360740-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360740" id="auto-id-1556699360947"> <div class="f-fl bd">|</div> <a class="f-fl f-fc9 manBtn" hidefocus="true"><span></span>管理</a> </div></div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360942">举报</a> <div class="f-fr divider">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-delBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360943" style="display: none;">删除</a> <div class="j-delDivider f-fr divider" style="display: none;">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt cmtBtn j-cmtBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360944">评论(0)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699360962" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="0">0</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699360963" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_5">网络化教学方式相比于课堂教学更便捷，并且我能在课前自主预习，对于老师留的测验及时进行，网络平台上的资料对我很有帮助。 此外，在学习中，我对网络知识有了一个系统的了解。学会了Word(文字处理)、excel(表格管理)、powerpoint(幻灯片制作)、等等软件的较为深入的应用。但这次学习更多的是让我更新了全新的观念和想法，充分认识到了现代教育教学媒体特性的重要性</div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" auto-1556699360740-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360740" id="auto-id-1556699360974"> <div class="f-fl bd">|</div> <a class="f-fl f-fc9 manBtn" hidefocus="true"><span></span>管理</a> </div></div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360969">举报</a> <div class="f-fr divider">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-delBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360971">评论(0)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699360989" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="0">0</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699360990" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_6"><span style="caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);">网络化教学方式相比于课堂教学更便捷，并且我能在课前自主预习，对于老师留的测验及时进行，网络平台上的资料对我很有帮助。 此外，在学习中，我对网络知识有了一个系统的了解。学会了Word(文字处理)、excel(表格管理)、powerpoint(幻灯片制作)、等等软件的较为深入的应用。但这次学习更多的是让我更新了全新的观念和想法，充分认识到了现代教育教学媒体特性的重要性</span></div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/forumpersonal?uid=1136574070" title="hrbuc2011王悦_王悦">hrbuc2011王...</a></span> </span></div> <div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time">2018-6-30</div> <div class="f-fr j-manBox auto-1556699360740-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360740" id="auto-id-1556699361001"> <div class="f-fl bd">|</div> <a class="f-fl f-fc9 manBtn" hidefocus="true"><span></span>管理</a> </div></div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360996">举报</a> <div class="f-fr divider">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-delBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360997" style="display: none;">删除</a> <div class="j-delDivider f-fr divider" style="display: none;">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt cmtBtn j-cmtBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699360998">评论(0)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361016" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="0">0</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361017" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent auto-1556699360753-parent" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_7"><p>网络化教学方式相比于课堂教学更便捷，并且我能在课前自主预习，对于老师留的测验及时进行，网络平台上的资料对我很有帮助。 此外，在学习中，我对网络知识有了一个系统的了解。学会了Word(文字处理)、excel(表格管理)、powerpoint(幻灯片制作)、等等软件的较为深入的应用。但这次学习更多的是让我更新了全新的观念和想法，充分认识到了现代教育教学媒体特性的重要性</p></div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/forumpersonal?uid=1136757146" title="hrbcu2210郭春秋_郭春秋">hrbcu2210郭...</a></span> </span></div> <div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time">2018-6-30</div> <div class="f-fr j-manBox auto-1556699360740-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360740" id="auto-id-1556699361028"> <div class="f-fl bd">|</div> <a class="f-fl f-fc9 manBtn" hidefocus="true"><span></span>管理</a> </div></div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361023">举报</a> <div class="f-fr divider">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-delBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361024" style="display: none;">删除</a> <div class="j-delDivider f-fr divider" style="display: none;">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt cmtBtn j-cmtBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361025">评论(1)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361043" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="0">0</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361044" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div><div class="m-commentWrapper f-pr f-cb auto-1556699360753" style="z-index: 99;"> <div class="wrap f-fr"> <div class="m-comment-pool j-commentpool auto-1556699360736-parent"><div class="m-basepool f-cb auto-1556699360736"> <div class="j-list"> <div class="m-data-lists f-cb f-pr j-data-list auto-1556699360751-parent"><div class="auto-1556699360751 auto-1556699360747-parent first last"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_16">网络化教学方式相比于课堂教学更便捷，并且我能在课前自主预习，对于老师留的测验及时进行，网络平台上的资料对我很有帮助。 此外，在学习中，我对网络知识有了一个系统的了解。学会了Word(文字处理)、excel(表格管理)、powerpoint(幻灯片制作)、等等软件的较为深入的应用。但这次学习更多的是让我更新了全新的观念和想法，充分认识到了现代教育教学媒体特性的重要性</div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/forumpersonal?uid=1136576045" title="hrbcu2030田玉寒">hrbcu2030田...</a></span> </span></div> <div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time">2018-6-30</div> <div class="f-fr j-manBox id="auto-id-1556699361305" style="display: none;">评论(0)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider" style="display: none;">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361323" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="0">0</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361324" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div></div></div> <div class="u-pager f-pr j-data-pager auto-1556699360735-parent" style="display: none;"><div class="auto-1556699360735" id="auto-id-1556699361055"><a class="zbtn zprv js-disabled" href="#" id="auto-id-1556699361058">上一页</a><a class="zpgi zpg1 js-selected" href="#" id="auto-id-1556699361064">1</a><a class="zpgi zpg2" href="#" id="auto-id-1556699361066" style="display: none;"></a><a class="zpgi zpg3" href="#" id="auto-id-1556699361068" style="display: none;"></a><a class="zpgi zpg4" href="#" id="auto-id-1556699361070" style="display: none;"></a><a class="zpgi zpg5" href="#" id="auto-id-1556699361072" style="display: none;"></a><a class="zpgi zpg6" id="auto-id-1556699361060">下一页</a></div></div> </div> <div class="j-none empty" style="display:none"><span class="f-f0 f-fc9 j-none-txt f-ib"></span></div> </div></div> <div class="m-add-comment j-addcomment auto-1556699360749-parent"><div class="auto-1556699360749"> <p class="small j-unlogbox" style="display: none;">发表观点要登录哦！点击<a class="j-loginbtn loginbtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361049">登录</a></p> <p class="small j-logupbox" id="auto-id-1556699361048">添加评论...</p> <div class="j-logdownbox" style="display: none;"></div> </div></div> </div> <div class="j-triangle triangle" style="right: 100px;"></div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_8">网络化教学方式相比于课堂教学更便捷，并且我能在课前自主预习，对于老师留的测验及时进行，网络平台上的资料对我很有帮助。 此外，在学习中，我对网络知识有了一个系统的了解。学会了Word(文字处理)、excel(表格管理)、powerpoint(幻灯片制作)、等等软件的较为深入的应用。但这次学习更多的是让我更新了全新的观念和想法，充分认识到了现代教育教学媒体特性的重要性</div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/forumpersonal?uid=1136754284" title="hrbcu2207王宏研_王宏研">hrbcu2207王...</a></span> </span></div> <div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time">2018-6-30</div> <div class="f-fr j-manBox auto-1556699360740-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360740" id="auto-id-1556699361093"> <div class="f-fl bd">|</div> <a class="f-fl f-fc9 manBtn" hidefocus="true"><span></span>管理</a> </div></div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361088">举报</a> <div class="f-fr divider">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-delBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361089" style="display: none;">删除</a> <div class="j-delDivider f-fr divider" style="display: none;">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt cmtBtn j-cmtBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361090">评论(0)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361108" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="0">0</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361109" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_9"><span style="caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);">未来计算机发展趋势用以下几个字形容：轻、薄、微、云。 摩尔定律说当价格不变时，集成电路上可容纳的晶体管数目，约每隔18个月便会增加一倍，性能也将提升一倍。换言之，每一美元所能买到的电脑性能，将每隔18个月翻两倍以上。你没发现现在的CPU发展，更精密的工艺制程，让CPU芯片在面积是变得更加小巧。显卡也是如此。可以推断出到极小纳米工艺 概括一下，未来电脑发展趋势用以下几个字形容：轻、薄、微  云,云说的云端服务，据预测未来多数公司、甚至家庭都将使用云端服务，云计算给用户带来更多新体验。</span></div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/forumpersonal?uid=1136650329" title="hrbcu2124王凯_王凯">hrbcu2124王...</a></span> </span></div> <div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time">2018-6-30</div> <div class="f-fr j-manBox auto-1556699360740-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360740" id="auto-id-1556699361120"> <div class="f-fl bd">|</div> <a class="f-fl f-fc9 manBtn" hidefocus="true"><span></span>管理</a> </div></div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361115">举报</a> <div class="f-fr divider">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-delBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361116" style="display: none;">删除</a> <div class="j-delDivider f-fr divider" style="display: none;">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt cmtBtn j-cmtBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361117">评论(0)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361135" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="0">0</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361136" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_10"><span style="caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);">未来计算机发展趋势用以下几个字形容：轻、薄、微、云。 摩尔定律说当价格不变时，集成电路上可容纳的晶体管数目，约每隔18个月便会增加一倍，性能也将提升一倍。换言之，每一美元所能买到的电脑性能，将每隔18个月翻两倍以上。你没发现现在的CPU发展，更精密的工艺制程，让CPU芯片在面积是变得更加小巧。显卡也是如此。可以推断出到极小纳米工艺 概括一下，未来电脑发展趋势用以下几个字形容：轻、薄、微  云,云说的云端服务，据预测未来多数公司、甚至家庭都将使用云端服务，云计算给用户带来更多新体验。</span></div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/forumpersonal?uid=1136650329" title="hrbcu2124王凯_王凯">hrbcu2124王...</a></span> </span></div> <div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time">2018-6-30</div> <div class="f-fr j-manBox auto-1556699360740-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360740" id="auto-id-1556699361147"> <div class="f-fl bd">|</div> <a class="f-fl f-fc9 manBtn" hidefocus="true"><span></span>管理</a> </div></div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361142">举报</a> <div class="f-fr divider">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-delBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361143" style="display: none;">删除</a> <div class="j-delDivider f-fr divider" style="display: none;">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt cmtBtn j-cmtBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361144">评论(0)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361162" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="0">0</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361163" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_11"><p>网络化教学方式相比于课堂教学更便捷，并且我能在课前自主预习，对于老师留的测验及时进行，网络平台上的资料对我很有帮助。 此外，在学习中，我对网络知识有了一个系统的了解。学会了Word(文字处理)、excel(表格管理)、powerpoint(幻灯片制作)、等等软件的较为深入的应用。但这次学习更多的是让我更新了全新的观念和想法，充分认识到了现代教育教学媒体特性的重要性</p></div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/forumpersonal?uid=1136757146" title="hrbcu2210郭春秋_郭春秋">hrbcu2210郭...</a></span> </span></div> <div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time">2018-6-30</div> <div class="f-fr j-manBox auto-1556699360740-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360740" id="auto-id-1556699361174"> <div class="f-fl bd">|</div> <a class="f-fl f-fc9 manBtn" hidefocus="true"><span></span>管理</a> </div></div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361169">举报</a> <div class="f-fr divider">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-delBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361170" style="display: none;">删除</a> <div class="j-delDivider f-fr divider" style="display: none;">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt cmtBtn j-cmtBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361171">评论(0)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361189" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="0">0</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361190" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_12">网络化教学方式相比于课堂教学更便捷，并且我能在课前自主预习，对于老师留的测验及时进行，网络平台上的资料对我很有帮助。 此外，在学习中，我对网络知识有了一个系统的了解。学会了Word(文字处理)、excel(表格管理)、powerpoint(幻灯片制作)、等等软件的较为深入的应用。但这次学习更多的是让我更新了全新的观念和想法，充分认识到了现代教育教学媒体特性的重要性</div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/forumpersonal?uid=1136574077" title="hrbcu2009刘美琦_刘美琦">hrbcu2009刘...</a></span> </span></div> <div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time">2018-6-30</div> <div class="f-fr j-manBox <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361196">举报</a> <div class="f-fr divider">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-delBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361197" style="display: none;">删除</a> <div class="j-delDivider f-fr divider" style="display: none;">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt cmtBtn j-cmtBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361198">评论(0)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361216" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="0">0</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361217" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_13">网络化教学方式相比于课堂教学更便捷，并且我能在课前自主预习，对于老师留的测验及时进行，网络平台上的资料对我很有帮助。 此外，在学习中，我对网络知识有了一个系统的了解。学会了Word(文字处理)、excel(表格管理)、powerpoint(幻灯片制作)、等等软件的较为深入的应用。但这次学习更多的是让我更新了全新的观念和想法，充分认识到了现代教育教学媒体特性的重要性</div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="#/learn/forumpersonal?uid=1136643423" title="hrbcu2168李宝全_李宝全">hrbcu2168李...</a></span> </span></div> <div class="f-fl f-fc9 time j-time">2018-6-30</div> <div class="f-fr j-manBox <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-reportBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361223">举报</a> <div class="f-fr divider">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt delBtn j-delBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361224" style="display: none;">删除</a> <div class="j-delDivider f-fr divider" style="display: none;">|</div> <a class="f-fr f-fc9 opt cmtBtn j-cmtBtn" hidefocus="true" id="auto-id-1556699361225">评论(0)</a> <div class="j-cmtDivider f-fr divider">|</div> <div class="f-fr votebox j-vote auto-1556699360738-parent"><div class="f-cb auto-1556699360738"> <div class="up f-fl j-up hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361243" title="顶"></div> <p class="num f-fl f-thide j-num" title="0">0</p> <div class="down f-fl j-down hvr" id="auto-id-1556699361244" title="踩"></div> </div></div> </div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_14">网络化教学方式相比于课堂教学更便捷，并且我能在课前自主预习，对于老师留的测验及时进行，网络平台上的资料对我很有帮助。 此外，在学习中，我对网络知识有了一个系统的了解。学会了Word(文字处理)、excel(表格管理)、powerpoint(幻灯片制作)、等等软件的较为深入的应用。但这次学习更多的是让我更新了全新的观念和想法，充分认识到了现代教育教学媒体特性的重要性</div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span> <span class="userInfo j-userInfo"><a class="f-fcgreen" </div> </div></div><div class="f-pr auto-1556699360755 auto-1556699360747-parent last" style="z-index: 0;"><div class="m-detailInfoItem f-pr auto-1556699360747" style="z-index: 100;"> <div class="tagCt f-cb j-tagBox" style="display: none;"> <div class="u-forumtag u-forumtag1 j-tagTopNode">置顶</div> <div class="u-forumtag j-tagAgreeNode">赞同</div> </div> <div class="f-richEditorText j-content edueditor_styleclass_15"><span style="caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);">网络化教学方式相比于课堂教学更便捷，并且我能在课前自主预习，对于老师留的测验及时进行，网络平台上的资料对我很有帮助。 此外，在学习中，我对网络知识有了一个系统的了解。学会了Word(文字处理)、excel(表格管理)、powerpoint(幻灯片制作)、等等软件的较为深入的应用。但这次学习更多的是让我更新了全新的观念和想法，充分认识到了现代教育教学媒体特性的重要性</span>
<div><span style="caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);"><br/></span>
</div></div> <div class="bar f-cb"> <div class="f-fl name j-name auto-1556699360733-parent"><span class="auto-1556699360733"> <span class="anonyInfo j-anonyInfo" style="display: none;">匿名发表</span>
